lines.text: I'm proud of you Danny, I really am. I am so proud of you, but I can't be you.
But being a good boy's not enough, you know. It's not gonna pay the bills.
Sweetheart, you've done enough. Don't worry.

It's your fucking fault. It's your fucking fault I'm here. It's your fucking fault and I hate you, I fucking hate you, all of my fucking life. I want you to remember. I want you to remember right now what I look like. And I want you to know - no, don't touch me! No one can come here.
